text: Aldo Ruben Pignanelli (1 April 1950 - 15 June 2019) was an Argentine accountant and politician. He was born in Lanús, Argentina. Pignanelli was the Chair of the Central Bank of Argentina from 1 July 2002 to 6 December 2002. He was a member of the Justicialist Party. Pignanelli died in Buenos Aires on 15 June 2019 from prostate cancer, aged 69.Murió Aldo Pignanelli, expresidente del Banco Central ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Argentine politicians
title: Aldo Pignanelli
